item.title: Hugging Face CEO says we’re in an ‘LLM bubble,’ not an AI bubble
item.description: Hugging Face co-founder and CEO Clem Delangue says all the attention is on LLMs, but smaller, specialized models will make sense in many use cases goi...

item.title: AI data center provider Lambda raises whopping $1.5B after multibillion-dollar Microsoft deal
item.description: Lambda's new raise was a solid beat over the amount that deal-watchers say it was hoping to hit.

item.title: Meta wins antitrust trial as judge denies that it’s a monopoly
item.description: A federal judge ruled that Meta is not a monopoly in a lawsuit with the FTC.

item.title: Monarch Tractor sued over tractors that were ‘unable to operate autonomously’

item.title: Toyota keeps betting on hybrid vehicles in the US
item.description: The investment follows an announcement last week that Toyota will spend up to $10 billion over the next five years in the United States.
